name: PufferChase
description:
The theme for Trijam #130 is “Big Body”, so the game was conceived around a friendly pufferfish who can instantly become big.  

This is the tenth Trijam for Team Twosticks.  This was our second project in Godot.  We are starting to get our sea legs.  

This time we learned GitHub and Sourcetree from our in-house Git consultant L. Chan.

  • C. Haine  (12) coded and did some sound 
  • K. Haine (12) designed all artwork in Krita and  Pixlr E
  • P. Haine (>12)  Also coded.  Sound effects were recorded live and edited in Audacity.  Game jingles were composed in Logic Pro X.  

CREDITS

  • Theme music - Eric Matyas on soundimage.org https://soundimage.org/looping-music/ 
  • Thump sound - SoundBible.com
  • Light ray shader - by Peter Höglund of GodotShaders.com
